snippet.title: NINJIN: CLASH OF CARROTS – Free Demo Available Now!
snippet.description:
TechRaptor calls Ninjin: Clash of Carrots "24 Carrot Gold." Play the demo now! http://www.NinjinClash.com

Battle through side-scrolling, anime-inspired worlds as Ninjin, a charismatic bunny, or as Akai, a ninja fox, to recover your village’s stolen carrots from the claws of the evil Shogun Moe. Take down throngs of enemies and bosses, collecting carrots along the way. Spend them in the Corgi Store to purchase new equipment, or the Shady Shop for special weapons, tons of masks, and a bunch of other customization items.

Choose from a wide variety of equipment, outfitting your character to better defeat your opponents, and join your friends in 2-player local or online co-op as you progress through the game’s story and discover Ninjin's crazy universe!

Ninjin: Clash of Carrots is available for $14.99 on PC, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and Xbox One.  Play the demo now!

Steam (PC): https://store.steampowered.com/app/809870/Ninjin_Clash_of_Carrots/
Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/ninjin-clash-of-carrots-switch
PlayStation 4: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP4735-CUSA12847_00-NINJINBASEGAME01
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/ninjin-clash-of-carrots/bpn65mshs43g?activetab=pivot%3Aoverviewtab

Like on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/NinjinClash
Follow on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/NinjinClash
